messages.welcome: Hello! Do /help to see the list of commands you can use.

addReminder.description: Add new reminder. Usage: add reminder <reminder>

removeReminder.description: Remove selected reminder. Usage: remove reminder <reminder>

listReminder.description: Give the list of reminders in the list to be sent

setInterval.description: Set the interval of message sending for each interval. Usage: set interval <seconds>

help.description: See the list of commands available

todo.description: See the list of todo's the developer has to implement
